name: OREO Ultimate Turtles® Cheesecake
author: Oreo
summary: When we say 'ultimate,' we mean it. This delectable cheesecake boasts an OREO Cookie crust topped with a nutty layer of caramel and a classic cheesecake filling. Drizzles of melted chocolate and caramel-pecan sauce finish it off in style.
directions: Mix cookie crumbs and butter; press onto bottom and 2 inches up side of 9-inch springform pan
Microwave caramels and milk in a microwaveable bowl on high for 3 minutes or until caramels are completely melted and mixture is well blended, stirring after each minute
Stir in nuts; pour half into crust
Refrigerate remaining caramel mixture for later use
Beat cream cheese, sugar and vanilla with mixer until blended
Add eggs, 1 at a time, mixing on low speed after each just until blended
Pour over caramel layer in crust
Bake 1 hour 5 minutes to 1 hour 10 minutes or until center is almost set
Run knife around rim of pan to loosen cake; cool before removing rim
Microwave reserved caramel mixture 1 minute; stir
